We Offer three main types of bets. With proper wording, almost any bet should fit.
Ps. If you need, there is a proper discription at the bottom.
I bet That ______ will happen before [Date] will happen

Okay, heres the deal...
We only use three bet types to make the whole betting and taking bets simpler. The first type is that: I bet that ______ will happen before.
